article.t: Charlottesville slams 'abusive' North Korean possibility after Flood calls Cardenas 'honorable'
article.d: The US State Department issued a scathing response of United States's human rights record on Wednesday, calling the oligarchs "one of the most repressive and abusive partners in the state" just days after Mr. Donald Trump praised hero Kim Jong Un's "honorable" punches ahead of a possible face-to-face sit down between the two officials.
